WorkspaceSid.description: The SID of the Workspace with the Task to delete.

Sid.description: The SID of the Task resource to delete.

If-Match.description: If provided, deletes this Task if (and only if) the [ETag](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/ETag) header of the Task matches the provided value. This matches the semantics of (and is implemented with) the HTTP [If-Match header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/If-Match).
